snippet: Kleber Mendonça Filho’s movie “Neighboring Sounds” looks at how Brazil’s booming economy affects everyday life.
abstract: Kleber Mendonca Filho film Neighboring Sounds looks at how Brazil’s booming economy is affecting everyday life for the nation's people, with the incessant clatter of construction and sounds of progress drowning out the faint murmur of the sea and the soundtrack of simpler times.
lead_paragraph: Kleber Mendonça Filho’s movie “Neighboring Sounds” looks at how Brazil’s booming economy affects everyday life.

headline.main: In Brazil, a Noisy, Tense Prosperity
headline.print_headline: In Brazil, a Noisy, Tense Prosperity
